I kept this however, because I liked the pattern so much and I have figured out a way to shorten it so that I can wear it Over the top of my waistband.  Personally, I don’t like long tops because with my short legs, it tends to shorten them even more.
This top looks so pretty on! And because it has 3/4 sleeves you can wear it through most seasons! I might go back and get another one in a different color. I bought a medium.  I’m 150 lbs, 5”7’.

评论详情: If you have trouble with rough seams and itchy, unbreathable fabrics, this shirt might work for you. It feels soft on the skin, so you can wear it as an undershirt layer in winter. I like the odd prints better than the florals, but there are enough choices to suit most tastes.

Bought these for my elderly mother, as they stated that they were loose fit even bought a large as she has issues with her shoulders and putting on shirts over her head. She is not a large woman. 4'9" and 123 lb. She hadn't even washed them yet when she tried it on, it fit her like a tube top. Very disappointed.
fit great —colors beautiful
The fabric is very comfortable and it’s a flattering fit. I love the 3/4 length sleeves. So many cute designs to choose from.

评论概述: runs at least one size small

Maybe they did, and decided instead to make the other style I ordered unreturnable, instead of owning it.  I don't like to waste money.  I'm kinda funny that way.  I appreciate a savvy manufacturer who gives necessary information up front.  At least I'd expect Amazon would compute the returns and put it into the description.
It fits true to size

This is a very pretty shirt to look at. I love the vibrant colors and pattern, and the fit is perfect. The fabric is a bit meh for me though because it's super polyester-y and unnatural. It's a bit hot too due to the fabric. But for a night out, it looks good. I probably wouldn't buy it another pattern because I'd only wear it in limited instances, but I am glad I bought this one to have in my wardrobe for those "going out to eat at a nice restaurant" occasions.
The body is a bit long (I wear a petite S) but the small fits otherwise. The silky fabric is nice and the color print (PA171) is accurate. I'm pleased.
Very comfortable material.  Fits true to size.  Love it.
True to size. Good quality.

I like how soft the fabric feels. It's stretchable too. Sewn well. Lightweight but not too thin. True to size. I got complements from my kids and husband so I definately recommend it!

I like how soft they are. Stitching is good. Got mediums. Slightly loose on me. Hoping they'll shrink just a little, but likely not. That's okay. They're pretty, nice shape to them and it feels almost like you have nothing on. I like them alot.

This is a 3/4 sleeve with a green/blue leaf design throughout the entire shirt. Fits true to size, lightweight and comfortable.  Very soft and flowy.  Pairs well with casual wear and the pattern is a little busy so would want to wear with solid pants or jeans.  Seems to be made well and good quality.
These look very nice but I have found they run smaller than the normal size I buy.

This women’s casual 3/4 sleeve shirt is a loose and comfortable fit. It fits very nicely. Color/ style/ design is as expected. Very versatile shirt. Can be worn dressy or casually. I definitely recommend.
This top is soft and just wash and hang dry. True to size and perfect length.

I like the fabric. First, I ordered 3 large. Only one fit like a large and I kept it. The teal with the fuschia and pinkish flowers ran the smallest. I had to order an X-Large to get a large fit. The white with the blue and light orange pattern ran huge. I ordered X-Large based on smaller fit of the others and it fit like an xx-large. The coral was the same. I had to try all 6 tops because they all fit differently in the same size group. As for quality, the teal with flowers was sewn the best. The others were sewn unevenly for the most part. I’d look elsewhere for better quality.

nice fit

Good for lots of uses, definitely a closet staple. I love that it comes in so many colors and you can layer it well to make lots of outfits. Soft material very comfy and soft, fits very loose you may want to size down.

评论概述: Poly Has Made Much Improvement, Why Not Use it In This Top?
评论详情: I really like the color of this top. Looks exactly like the photos. Fits okay, too. Happy with the length of the sleeve. It's lightweight. Those pros get a 5-Star Rating.  The drawback and the reason for the 1-Star Rating is that rubbery polyester feel. I am not a fan of that type of poly. Glad I got the larger size as it isn't as tight and much of that icky feel is lost.  I wish they would have used better quality material.  This isn't the 60's or 70's.  Poly has made much improvement in 50 years, so why not take advantage of the "new" polyester material in this top?  While it's a great color and decent fit, I would NOT buy it again.

This top is very cute. I love the pattern., I got a medium, it’s a little snugger than I would’ve liked, but the pattern is so cute. I just hope I don’t see myself coming and going because this is the kind of top that gets very popular. I’m 5’4” 140 pounds 36D. It came neatly packaged and seems very well made. I actually ordered another one right after I got this one.
Lightweight and as pretty as pictured. Medium was perfect (5’2” 120 lbs). Received within two days.
Attractive to wear.
The color is beautiful, material is soft and fits well.
The shirt is nice but you might want to order bigger than usual if you don't want the sleeves as tight.
Very comfortable and great for casual dress up.

I ordered this for my wife, and she absolutely loves it. It fits and lays well on her. The fabric is very soft, and the colors are bright and stand out nicely. The stitching looked well done and in straight lines without a bunch of threads coming out. She wants to order more of these in different patterns now. It's a hit with her.
And so comfortable. Many compliments

This lightweight shirt is very pretty and has beautiful colors. It is well made. It will be perfect for the spring and fall seasons as well as cool summer evenings in my northern area. It is very soft and comfortable. It is a perfect fit as described in the size chart.

This top is comfortable and fits well, according to the wife. She liked the look of it and since it’s more of a three-quarter length sleeve t-shirt, she thought it would probably be acceptable for work where clothes are more casual. She wore it with jeans, and it looked great. It washed up fine and she’s pleased with it.  It’s constructed well, too.

This is a light weight top that launders well. The tunic length and 3/4 sleeves hide a multitude of sins :) When you click on the size chart directly below the Select Size button it takes you to their chart for a button down shirt, which is significantly different than the size chart you get to by scrolling way down the page (see photo). So ignore the first one and use the second; it's accurate.

This shirt exceeded my expectations! It is comfortable and stretchy while also flattering. It fits true to size and the vertical design is very slimming. The fabric isn't thick but it is soft and the print is vibrant and beautiful. It held up well in the wash and I didn't experience any shrinking or fading.

I love the color.  A very soft, comfy material in a light pastel peach color.  The sizing is spot on.  I am 5'7,  120 pounds,  36b chest and the medium fits me perfectly.  I would definitely recommend.

Coral coloration is consistent and nice. Well made with no fabric flaws or string tags. Fabric is very soft, almost modal in texture. Body sized as described with enough flex to be comfortable. Sleeves were a little shorter on my frame than expected, but were still below the elbow.

I ordered this blouse for my wife, who was delighted with the color and perfect fit.  Along with having very soft and comfortable material, the top goes well with a wide variety of my wife’s outfits and jewelry.  Overall, the blouse not only matches the website description and photos, but the price is very reasonable for such a top quality shirt. Definitely recommended!
The perfect shirt to go under a sweater or a vest.  It's very thin so great if you run warm.  The 3/4 sleeve are perfect in my opinion.
It was a nice change from solid color or striped T shirt. Love the 3/4 sleeves when doing housework too

评论概述: Nice soft material and flattering fit
评论详情: The garment came packaged in a shrink like zipper bag. I always worry about bad smells when sealed up like that but this arrived without any strong odors. It is silky and stretchy and probably will be great for traveling as this type fabric normally does not wrinkle. 3/4 length sleeves hit about 3 inches under my elbow (I am petite) and the overall garment length is perfect for me. If I went by the size chart I could have ordered the Small, but I do not like anything very form fitting so I went with the Medium and glad I did. Spandex in the mix can be clingy but with the medium it is just fine. This could work equally well under a nice blazer or just popped over jeans. A versatile, basic wardrobe piece.
It's soft, pretty, the design is very pretty. I ordered size Large and it fit very well.

Written by my wife: I am 5 ft tall, 125 lbs, 32D and size small in this tee fits me well. It’s soft and comfortable and I like the pink stripe design I ordered. The 3/4 sleeves and the hem are a little long on me, but I’m petite. I washed my top on gentle cycle and hung to air dry and had no issues at all. I think it would do fine in the dryer as well. I would buy this in other colors.

I've reached the age that I love 3/4 length sleeves and was glad to find this one.  I like this top more than I expected.  The color is beautiful and the fabric is very soft.  It fits me very well which means that it probably runs a little small.  Overall, I'm very glad that I ordered this one!

I love everything about this blouse. The fabric is soft and lighter weight, but not transparent. I think the pattern is so pretty and it's busy enough to camouflage body imperfections. The length is good for leggings and I like the 3/4 length sleeves. You could wear it for dressy or casual. This is a big 5 star blouse to me, highly recommend!

This is a nice 3/4 sleeve length crew neck shirt that is great for fall. My wife is 116 lbs and 5'4 and the small was a litle looser than shed wish, but it still works out. Nice set of pretty colors and patterns to choose from. The material is very soft, stretchy , light and high quality made from polyester and spandex. I'd say its a more casual shirt than dressy. Looks good with jeans. My wife washed it on gentle cycle and tumble dried low hoping itd shrink a little, but it didnt.
I really love the colors and pattern of this top. It is soft and has a nice drape to it. I find it very flattering to my shape and the price and quality are good.

This black top can be worn under a jacket or by itself.  The fabric is nice and short.  The 3/4 sleeves are a very comfortable length making the top usable for most seasons.  The fit was nice and size appropriate.

Make sure to check the size chart especially if you are larger in the bust. When tops say loose fit I wear a M to L. Regular fit L or XL. I had to go to a 2XL and still a but snug. Possible it's mislabeled but I have seen this too often sizes are all over the place. Just make sure to check your measurements.  Other than that it's super soft and and a beautiful print.

Zeagoo casual 3/4 sleeve shirt black medium: + Zeagoo is one of my favorite brand of tops on Amazon for the fit, quality + price. Love this shirt. FABRIC: Very soft. Very comfortable. Stretchy. Air dries quickly. FIT: 5'3" 38 top, 29 waist. Medium size in this top and my other tops fit great. Fit is flattering, just slightly form fitting, loose but not boxy. STYLE: Clean, simple, casual yet elegant. Versatile. 3/4 sleeve is perfect for travel, can easily be layered for cold weather. Complements just about any item I pair it with. This top is a go to wardrobe staple for me. Very happy with the fit! Recommend. Hope this was helpful.

评论概述: Very soft, even a bit silky
评论详情: This is not a cotton tee.  This is a bit nicer than that.  It is a softer, silkier material, a polyester but a nice polyester.  It even has a bit of stretch to it.  The pattern is very pretty.  It is comfortable and made well.  There are no loose threads or bad smells.  I think it's flattering and well priced.
Je suis agréablement surprise par la beauté de ce chandail ! Le tissu n'est pas très épais mais n'est pas transparent et c'est parfait pour moi. J'en ai commandé en 2 autres couleurs.

I bought several of these for my mother and they are really nice. The fabric is slightly stretchy so there is give in it and they fit true to size. The patterns are really nice. Overall a good quality shirt with proper stitching and don't look cheap at all.
Très doux et très confortable. Cependant le bleu est plus pâle que sur la photo et le blanc est plutôt crème.
I love this shirt.
The colour and graphic are not as bright as shown and fabric is cheap and syntheticky looking.
